ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:07:16 [Issue ID 4000-39629] urn:comicvine:4000-39629 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 03:47:34. [Issue ID 55666]
ComicInfo.Summary: The Night Tribes want to start a war with the humans and begin their campaign by taking a biological plague to a rock concert to infect the crowd. Wetworks swoops in and saves the day but Crossbones and Flattop lose their lives in the process.
